title: BMMJ06
description: Lidding Foil Ended or sensor not sensing the foil.
reasons_remedies: The lidding foil end switch is activated.
Check whether the lidding foil is finished.
Load new lidding foil reel if needed.
Join the lidding foil with another lidding foil, which will be finished.
Check if the lidding foil moves out from the lidding foil end switch.

media.caption: Lifdding foil Mounting and switch Foil Location

text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMJ06
Error Code 06
Category: BMMJ
Title: BMMJ06
Alarm Message: Lidding Foil End
Description: Lidding Foil Ended or sensor not sensing the foil.
Reason & Remedy:
1. The lidding foil end switch is activated.
2. Check whether the lidding foil is finished.
3. Load new lidding foil reel if needed.
4. Join the lidding foil with another lidding foil, which will be finished.
5. Check if the lidding foil moves out from the lidding foil end switch.
Visual References:
- Lidding Foil End Switch Location
- Lifdding foil Mounting and switch Foil Location
